electronic.label: Air Fryer
electronic.description: Healthy cooking appliance that circulates hot air to cook food with little to no oil.

electronic.label: Air Conditioner
electronic.description: Cooling system that regulates temperature and humidity in indoor spaces.

electronic.label: Air Purifier
electronic.description: Device that removes contaminants from the air to improve indoor air quality.

electronic.label: Blender
electronic.description: Kitchen appliance used for mixing, pureeing, or emulsifying food and liquids.

electronic.label: Electric Fan
electronic.description: Portable cooling device that circulates air in a room.

electronic.label: Electric Kettle
electronic.description: Quick and efficient appliance for boiling water for tea, coffee, or other hot beverages.

electronic.label: Electric Oven
electronic.description: Cooking appliance used for baking, roasting, and heating food.

electronic.label: Hair Dryer
electronic.description: Hand-held device that blows hot or cool air to dry and style hair.

electronic.label: Iron
electronic.description: Appliance used to remove wrinkles from fabric through heat and pressure.

electronic.label: Microwave
electronic.description: Kitchen appliance that uses electromagnetic waves to heat and cook food quickly.

electronic.label: Refrigerator
electronic.description: Large appliance for keeping food and beverages cool and fresh.

electronic.label: Rice Cooker
electronic.description: Automated kitchen appliance designed to steam or boil rice.

electronic.label: Vacuum Cleaner
electronic.description: Cleaning device that uses suction to remove dirt and debris from floors and surfaces.

electronic.label: Washing Machine
electronic.description: Appliance used to clean clothes and textiles automatically.
